name: That's My Gold
description:
Anyone who dares to even glimpse on my gold, waiting for you are endless collisions, bone crushing explosions, inferno flame and freezing ice -- I will destroy you using all means! Dare not to try!!

That’s My Gold!

Features:
*Intense gameplay and unstoppable actions
*8 unique weapons and traps with upgrades
*19 arcade levels and 1 endless battle
*Waves and waves of different enemies
*Paper cut style graphic with cute cartoon violence

Note: That's My Gold is best played on an iPhone 3GS or higher with latest firmware installed.
